name: The Lost Artifact
description: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the Forbidden Cave.

name: Rescue the Villagers
description: Save the villagers captured by bandits in the Dark Forest.

name: Gather Healing Herbs
description: Collect 10 rare healing herbs for the town's healer.

name: Defeat the Dragon
description: Slay the fire-breathing dragon terrorizing the mountains.

name: Escort the Merchant
description: Protect the merchant traveling to the next city.
reward: 200 gold and a special trade discount

name: The Missing Scout
description: Find and bring back the missing scout from the wilderness.
reward: 150 gold and a map of hidden paths

name: Repair the Bridge
description: Collect materials and repair the broken bridge over the river.

name: The Cursed Necklace
description: Destroy the cursed necklace causing havoc in the village.

name: Defend the Outpost
description: Help the soldiers defend the outpost from an enemy raid.

name: Explore the Ruins
description: Investigate the ancient ruins and report back your findings.
reward: 300 gold and a relic of power
